程序包 org.elassandra.index

类 ElasticSecondaryIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elassandra.index.ElasticSecondaryIndex
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.cassandra.index.Index
    public class ElasticSecondaryIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.cassandra.index.Index
    Custom secondary index for CQL3 only, should be created when mapping is applied and local shard started. Index rows as documents when Elasticsearch clusterState has no write blocks and local shard is started.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • getInitializationTask

        public java.util.concurrent.Callable<?> getInitializationTask()
        Return a task to perform any initialization work when a new index instance is created. This may involve costly operations such as (re)building the index, and is performed asynchronously by SecondaryIndexManager
        指定者:
        getInitializationTask 在接口中 org.apache.cassandra.index.Index
        返回:
        a task to perform any necessary initialization work

      • onShardStarted

        public void onShardStarted​(IndexShard indexShard)
        Start 2i index rebuild once all associated shards are started. Rebuild is tried only once (closing+opening index should not trigger many rebuild).
